    Selected Publications

    Deception by Motion: The Eater and the Mover Game
    Rostobaya, V., Guan, Y., Berneburg, J., and Shishika, D., “Deception by motion: the eater and the mover game,” in IEEE Control Systems Letters.

    On the Adversarial Convex Body Chasing Problem
    Guan, Y., Pan, L., Shishika, D., and Tsiotras, P., “On the adversarial convex body chasing problem,” in 2023 IEEE American Control Conference (ACC), pp. 435-440.

    Hierarchical Decompositions of Stochastic Pursuit-Evasion Games
    Guan, Y., Afshari, M., Zhang, Q., and Tsiotras, P., “Hierarchical decompositions of stochastic pursuit-evasion games,” in 2022 IEEE Conference on Decision and Control (CDC), pp. 5062-5067.

    Shaping Large Population Agent Behaviors through Entropy-Regularized Mean-Field Games
    Guan, Y., Zhou, M., Paknyat, A. and Tsiotras, P., “Shaping large population agent behaviors through entropy-regularized mean-field games,” in 2022 IEEE American Cosntrol Conference (ACC), pp. 4429-4435.

    Dynamic Defender-Attacker Blotto Game
    Shishika, D.*, Guan, Y.*, Dorothy, M., and Kumar, V., “Dynamic defender-attacker Blotto game,” in 2022 IEEE American Cosntrol Conference (ACC), pp. 4429-4435.

    Learning Nash Equilibria in Zero-Sum Stochastic Games via Entropy-Regularized Policy Approximation
    Guan, Y.*, Zhang, Q.*, and Tsiotras, P., “Learning Nash equilibria in zero-Sum stochastic games via entropy-regularized policy approximation,” in 2021 International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence (IJCAI), pp. 2462-2468.

    Bounded-Rational Pursuit-Evasion Games
    Guan, Y., Maity, D., Kroninger, C., and Tsiotras, P., “Bounded-rational pursuit-evasion games,” in 2021 IEEE American Control Conference (ACC), pp. 3216-3221.

    Review of High Throughput Satellites: Market Disruptions, Affordability-Throughput Map, and the Cost per Bit/Second Decision Tree
    Guan, Y., Geng, F., and Saleh, J., “Review of High Throughput Satellites: Market disruptions, affordability-throughput map, and the cost per bit/second decision tree,” in IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine, pp. 64-80.

    Manuscripts in Submission

    Shishika, D.*, Guan, Y.*, Dorothy, M., Marden, J., Tsiotras, P., and Kumar, V., “Dynamic Adversarial Resource Allocation: the dDAB Game,” under review at IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control. arXiv e-prints, 2304.02172, 2023.

    Guan, Y., Afshari, M., and Tsiotras, P., “Zero-Sum Games between Mean-Field Teams: A Common Information and Reachability based Analysis,” under review at IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control. arXiv e-prints, 2303.12243, 2023.
